elements: When your mouth waters, when your vision swims, you see the red cup; and now and then it will speak to you.
elements.notes: this is removed at the end of each day in which you can support your needs.

elements: 'No live organism can continue for long to exist sanely under conditions of absolute reality.' - Shirley Jackson
'Dull minds are never either intuitive or mathematical.' - Blaise Pascal
This is your body. There are other bodies; this one is yours alone.
